text: Gordan Mihić (, 19 September 1938 — 11 August 2019) was a Serbian playwright best known for his work on movie scripts for Black Cat, White Cat, Time of the Gypsies, Balkan Express and for the TV series Otvorena vrata and Kamiondžije. He was married to actress Vera Čukić with whom he had a daughter, Ivana Mihić, also an actress. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- style="background:Lavender; text-align:center;" |- style="background:#b0c4de; text-align:center;" !
